title: Pear, blue cheese and walnut salad
ingredients: ['75ml tomato ketchup', '125ml distilled malt vinegar', '150g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons salt', '250ml rapeseed oil', '2 heads romaine lettuce, chopped', '115g crumbled blue cheese', '2 pears, peeled, cored and chopped', '60g toasted chopped walnuts', '1/2 red onion, chopped']
